title: Person of Interest 2x12 Reese Carter emotional scene
author: George Finch
comment: this is an awesome scene. If John would have went back in the service, he would have seen her in 2 weeks. But because he went back, he could not save her

Small decisions can change an entire Life Trajectory, John made Big decisions and DUH (writer fail)
Loved this show.. just trying to figure out which Character instigated the entire delusion for the story/show
Great entertainment

To this day I do not understand why he left her?

It should be a sin for a man to be that damn good lookin...lol
description: Person of Interest 2x12 Reese Carter emotional scene
